title: Associate Software Engineer (C++ Developer - Fresher)
responsibilities: design, implement, and maintain software components and applications using c++ (c++11/14/17).
collaborate with senior engineers to translate requirements into efficient, reliable, and scalable code.
debug, profile, and optimize c++ applications for performance and memory usage.
write clean, modular, and well-documented code following object-oriented programming and design patterns.
participate in code reviews, unit testing, and integration testing to ensure high-quality deliverables.
work with cross-functional teams (qa, devops, product) to deliver production-grade software.
assist in maintaining build systems (cmake, make, or similar) and version control (git).
stay updated with modern c++ features, libraries, and industry best practices.
